metadata.dc:author: Costa-Casaretto, C
metadata.dc:description: The percutaneous drainage of a giant ovarian cyst using a thick needle is described. The author, Dr Juan N Casanova sustained a controversy with medical authorities of the so called Protomedicato.
metadata.dc:title: La Revista Médica de Chile: 100 años atras.
[The Revista Médica de Chile: 100 years ago].
